languages.text: "Не смейте говорить мне подобное, слышите?" {n}Кассия впивается когтями в белоснежные волосы, и струйки крови окрашивают их в алый.{/n} "Я могла убить вас при первой встрече. Случайно свести с ума на корабле. Из-за меня на вас напали в собственном дворце, а сейчас... Сейчас..." {n}Кассия резко выпрямляется, и взгляд ее становится бесстрастным и пустым.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Не смейте говорить мне подобное, слышите?" {n}Кассия впивается когтями в белоснежные волосы, и струйки крови окрашивают их в алый.{/n} "Я могла убить вас при первой встрече. Случайно свести с ума на корабле. Из-за меня на вас напали в собственном дворце, а сейчас... Сейчас..." {n}Кассия резко выпрямляется, и взгляд ее становится бесстрастным и пустым.{/n}

languages.text: "Do not speak of such things, do you hear me?" {n}Cassia digs her sharp nails into her head and rivulets of blood turn her hair from white to crimson.{/n} "I could have killed you when we first met. I could have unwittingly robbed you of reason on your ship. It is my fault you were attacked in your own palace, and now... now..." {n}Cassia suddenly straightens, and her gaze becomes impassive and blank.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Не смейте говорить мне подобное, слышите?" {n}Кассия впивается когтями в белоснежные волосы, и струйки крови окрашивают их в алый.{/n} "Я могла убить вас при первой встрече. Случайно свести с ума на корабле. Из-за меня на вас напали в собственном дворце, а сейчас... Сейчас..." {n}Кассия резко выпрямляется, и взгляд ее становится бесстрастным и пустым.{/n}

I could have unwittingly robbed you of reason aboard your ship. It is my fault you were attacked in your own palace, and now... Now..." {n}Cassia suddenly straightens, and her gaze becomes impassive and vacant.{/n}

I could have unwittingly robbed you of reason on your ship. It is my fault you were attacked in your own palace, and now... now..." {n}Cassia suddenly straightens, and her gaze becomes impassive and blank.{/n}

languages.text: 「その話はしないでください」{n}カシアは鋭い爪を頭に食い込ませ、血の小滴が彼女の白い髪を真紅に染める。{/n}「最初に会ったとき、私はあなたを殺していたかもしれない。あなたの船に乗り、知らず知らずのうちにあなたの理性を奪ってしまっていたかもしれません。あなたが宮殿で襲われたのは私のせいです。それに今…」{n}カシア背筋を伸ばし、その視線は無表情でうつろになった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do not speak of such things, do you hear me?" {n}Cassia digs her sharp nails into her head and rivulets of blood turn her hair from white to crimson.{/n} "I could have killed you when we first met. I could have unwittingly robbed you of reason on your ship. It is my fault you were attacked in your own palace, and now... now..." {n}Cassia suddenly straightens, and her gaze becomes impassive and blank.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「その話はしないでください」{n}カシアは鋭い爪を頭に食い込ませ、血の小滴が彼女の白い髪を真紅に染める。{/n}「最初に会ったとき、私はあなたを殺していたかもしれない。あなたの船に乗り、知らず知らずのうちにあなたの理性を奪ってしまっていたかもしれません。あなたが宮殿で襲われたのは私のせいです。それに今…」{n}カシア背筋を伸ばし、その視線は無表情でうつろになった。{/n}

languages.text: “别再说这种话了，你听到了吗？”{n}卡西娅将锋利的指甲刺入了头里，鲜血像溪流一样流下，将她的白发染成了深红色。{/n}“我们第一次见面的时候，我说不定就会把你害死。我们在船上的时候，我可能会不经意间害你发疯。你在你自己的宫殿里遭到袭击，那也都是我的错，而现在……现在……”{n}卡西娅突然挺直了身子，目光变得冷漠而空洞。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do not speak of such things, do you hear me?" {n}Cassia digs her sharp nails into her head and rivulets of blood turn her hair from white to crimson.{/n} "I could have killed you when we first met. I could have unwittingly robbed you of reason on your ship. It is my fault you were attacked in your own palace, and now... now..." {n}Cassia suddenly straightens, and her gaze becomes impassive and blank.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “别再说这种话了，你听到了吗？”{n}卡西娅将锋利的指甲刺入了头里，鲜血像溪流一样流下，将她的白发染成了深红色。{/n}“我们第一次见面的时候，我说不定就会把你害死。我们在船上的时候，我可能会不经意间害你发疯。你在你自己的宫殿里遭到袭击，那也都是我的错，而现在……现在……”{n}卡西娅突然挺直了身子，目光变得冷漠而空洞。{/n}

languages.text: «No diga esas cosas, ¿me oye?». {n}Cassia se clava las afiladas uñas en la cabeza y regueros de sangre tiñen su pelo blanco de carmesí.{/n} «Podría haberl{mf|e|a} matado cuando nos conocimos. Podría haberle arrebatado la cordura a bordo de su nave. Fue culpa mía que l{mf|e|a} atacaran en su propio palacio, y ahora... Ahora...». {n}Cassia se endereza de repente, y su mirada se vuelve impasible y vacía.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do not speak of such things, do you hear me?" {n}Cassia digs her sharp nails into her head and rivulets of blood turn her hair from white to crimson.{/n} "I could have killed you when we first met. I could have unwittingly robbed you of reason on your ship. It is my fault you were attacked in your own palace, and now... now..." {n}Cassia suddenly straightens, and her gaze becomes impassive and blank.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «No diga esas cosas, ¿me oye?». {n}Cassia se clava las afiladas uñas en la cabeza y regueros de sangre tiñen su pelo blanco de carmesí.{/n} «Podría haberl{mf|e|a} matado cuando nos conocimos. Podría haberle arrebatado la cordura a bordo de su nave. Fue culpa mía que l{mf|e|a} atacaran en su propio palacio, y ahora... Ahora...». {n}Cassia se endereza de repente, y su mirada se vuelve impasible y vacía.{/n}

languages.text: "Sprecht nicht von solchen Dingen, hört Ihr?" {n}Cassia gräbt ihre scharfen Nägel in ihren Kopf. Blut färbt ihr weißes Haar rot.{/n} "Ich hätte Euch bei unserer ersten Begegnung töten können. Ich hätte Euch an Bord Eures Schiffs unbemerkt jeder Vernunft berauben können. Es ist meine Schuld, dass Ihr in Eurem eigenen Palast angegriffen wurdet, und nun ... Nun -"{n}, Cassia richtet sich plötzlich auf und ihr Blick wird teilnahmslos und leer.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do not speak of such things, do you hear me?" {n}Cassia digs her sharp nails into her head and rivulets of blood turn her hair from white to crimson.{/n} "I could have killed you when we first met. I could have unwittingly robbed you of reason on your ship. It is my fault you were attacked in your own palace, and now... now..." {n}Cassia suddenly straightens, and her gaze becomes impassive and blank.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sprecht nicht von solchen Dingen, hört Ihr?" {n}Cassia gräbt ihre scharfen Nägel in ihren Kopf. Blut färbt ihr weißes Haar rot.{/n} "Ich hätte Euch bei unserer ersten Begegnung töten können. Ich hätte Euch an Bord Eures Schiffs unbemerkt jeder Vernunft berauben können. Es ist meine Schuld, dass Ihr in Eurem eigenen Palast angegriffen wurdet, und nun ... Nun -"{n}, Cassia richtet sich plötzlich auf und ihr Blick wird teilnahmslos und leer.{/n}

languages.text: « Ne dites pas des choses pareilles, vous m'entendez ? » {n}Cassia plante ses ongles dans son crâne, et ses cheveux blancs se teignent d'écarlate.{/n} « J'aurais pu vous tuer lors de notre première rencontre. À bord de votre navire, j'aurais pu vous faire perdre la raison sans même m'en rendre compte. C'est ma faute si vous avez été {mf|attaqué|attaquée} dans votre propre palais, et maintenant... Maintenant... » {n}Cassia se redresse soudainement, le regard impassible.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do not speak of such things, do you hear me?" {n}Cassia digs her sharp nails into her head and rivulets of blood turn her hair from white to crimson.{/n} "I could have killed you when we first met. I could have unwittingly robbed you of reason on your ship. It is my fault you were attacked in your own palace, and now... now..." {n}Cassia suddenly straightens, and her gaze becomes impassive and blank.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ne dites pas des choses pareilles, vous m'entendez ? » {n}Cassia plante ses ongles dans son crâne, et ses cheveux blancs se teignent d'écarlate.{/n} « J'aurais pu vous tuer lors de notre première rencontre. À bord de votre navire, j'aurais pu vous faire perdre la raison sans même m'en rendre compte. C'est ma faute si vous avez été {mf|attaqué|attaquée} dans votre propre palais, et maintenant... Maintenant... » {n}Cassia se redresse soudainement, le regard impassible.{/n}

languages.text: "Öyle bir şey deme, anlıyor musun beni?" {n}Cassia, keskin tırnaklarını kendi başına batırıyor. Akan kan, beyaz saçlarını kızıla boyuyor.{/n} "Tanıştığımızda ölümüne sebep olabilirdim. Farkında olmadan geminde aklını yitirmene sebep olabilirdim. Kendi sarayında saldırıya uğraman benim hatamdı. Şimdi de... Şimdi de..." {n}Cassia, bir anda doğruluyor. Bakışları donuklaşıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do not speak of such things, do you hear me?" {n}Cassia digs her sharp nails into her head and rivulets of blood turn her hair from white to crimson.{/n} "I could have killed you when we first met. I could have unwittingly robbed you of reason on your ship. It is my fault you were attacked in your own palace, and now... now..." {n}Cassia suddenly straightens, and her gaze becomes impassive and blank.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Öyle bir şey deme, anlıyor musun beni?" {n}Cassia keskin tırnaklarını kendi başına batırıyor. Akan kandan beyaz saçları kızıla boyanıyor.{/n} "Tanıştığımızda ölümüne sebep olabilirdim. Farkında olmadan geminde aklını yitirmene sebep olabilirdim. Kendi sarayında saldırıya uğraman benim hatam. . Şimdi de... Şimdi..." {n}Cassia bir anda doğruluyor. Duygusuz ve donuk bakışlara bürünüyor.{/n}
